Reviews.Title: Problem loading widget.
Reviews.Author: Eh
Reviews.Content: Ok the ok the review you've been waiting on. First question, is it real? The price is so low. YES it's real, BUT the price rises with each purchase. I paid $330.00, it's now $375.00, as I write this review. Build Quality? Third times a charm? YES! It finally looks good! The back is NOT made from plastic regardless to what some "know-it-all" tells you. Sorry I do not remember the name of the material they used but I remember it has the famous Saffiano Leather look by Prada. Camera? Well for me that's a bad question but I shall try my best. I'm a photographer, so I have no problems with the camera , it's great! I used in a room with no lights, a shaded window and only light from the tv and what could shine thru the blinds. It was Ok, BUT then there's this photo editing app that comes with the phone! It's not Lightroom or anything but... It's ok, it's very decent,AND WILL BE USED. Flash? Sorry never used, I'm not a flash photographer. Sorry. The UI is in black/white, now that might not be for everyone but either you can change the UI or not get the phone. (Unless you NEED it because its Prada) It is in color. Speed? That depend on the user. I shut down every background app, and anything I'm not using, also I set everything to manual so nothing's refreshing on it own. I averaged we'll over 600mb of RAM, very very smooth interface. Oh yeah and the video is... Well in sunlight outside no complaints, any other lighting situation, maybe. Battery life? All I can say is, batteries are getting there. Now what you've been waiting for SOUND QUALITY!? Ok the speaker on the phone sucks. But of course it does! The only thing you want know is, Does it support lossless?...............well YES,YES IT DOES!

Reviews.Title: It's Prada
Reviews.Author: R. Brown "RE-Davis"
Reviews.Content: This phone arrived at my door less than week, and I purchased it using basic shipping and handling. No complaints, happy owner of an unlocked phone. Powerful and responsive but I will post another review once I have the phone for at least a month...

Reviews.Title: Having problems...
Reviews.Author: 009julz
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone a while ago, been having problems ever since, I can hear callers but everyone who speaks to me complains they can't hear me properly.  Also, I get a lot of dropped calls, struggles to pick up reception, not sure if I got a lemon?  I also get a lot of crackling noise over the phone.  I am using t-mobile as this seems to be the network that supports it, no-one will help me because it's an unlocked international phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Ace "Andres Ventura."
Reviews.Content: Really satisfied with this Android phone, it works great, touchscreen is very responsive without lag, battery life is OK, it lasts all day but not more than 30 hours without needing a charge while on all the time, don't bother buying a screen protector, it already comes with one, both cameras work great and take great pictures (for a cell phone) as for video quality it's really HD quality.The phone itself has a great look and looks much better than most phones out there, specially the over-hyped iPhone, I've gotten lots of compliments on it, the monochrome look adds to the phone's minimalistic looks which I really like.Overall it's one great phone, I'm not one of those persons who stays on Facebook/Twitter while on the phone as I do it all at home, so I pretty much needed a new change from my old Blackberry in both the looks department as well as functionality, the Android OS does the trick and the phone is nothing to be embarrassed about (unlike my old BB).

Reviews.Title: After one year experience
Reviews.Author: Daniel Ngo
Reviews.Content: I rate 3 stars for its designs. The phone is sleek and beautiful. The chrome buttons make it more fancy. Prada has its own theme on the phone which is very unique. Overall, this phone is beautifulLiterally, Im getting rid of it tomorrow for various reasons. First, they say you can update the system to 4.0. Sorry, you wont be able to do that if you live in the US. It runs Android version 2.3. Due to the version, when 2 or more apps running at once, the phone starts to slow down, glitching or even froze itself.Second, after using it for a while i realize whenever i use the phone when it's charging, the phone is extremely hot. Not even kidding, there is some spots get burning hot that i feel like something burning inside.Third, the rear facing camera is good with 8MP. The quality of pictures wasn't bad. The front facing camera with only 1MP and I don't complaint of picture quality either. But the color of pictures is not right. Whenever i try the front facing camera, the picture came out with too much green. For the rear facing camera, when i use flash it came out with bunch of bright effect. The photos were pale and not right.Finally, so many apps are not compatible with the system. Due to the old system, some apps like Instagram or Sanpchat keep corrupting when using.Overall, this is not a bad phone. If we could update the system, it would be a good phone to use. Otherwise, i rarely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: LG P940 PRADA
Reviews.Author: Danijela
Reviews.Content: Uses battery to much.  Everything else is very good.  I like the look, i like how it files. Just grate.

Reviews.Title: extraordinary - wonderful style
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Very light, bright display only bad thing, it needs to be charged every day and the update to ice cream is not as easy as described

Reviews.Title: This phone is smooth and sexy!
Reviews.Author: Desni
Reviews.Content: Im not really a fan of luxury products (I am the down home nitty gritty type), but this phone is thin and sleek.  If you have AT&T;, you may have to configure the API (you will know this if you cant receive MMS or get on the internet), but its not hard to do.  Email me if you run into that problem and I will assist you.  Its not as fast as other phones I've had (however, its close and decent) but chances are if you were looking for speed, you wouldn't be looking at this phone anyway.  Mine came with Android Ice Cream Sandwich 4.0.4 (Easy upgrade from Gingerbread).

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Gustavo
Reviews.Content: this phone is very cool, big screen, fast, I recommend buying. very light and thin, nice a a a a

Reviews.Title: Nice and good design
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I love design i cannot use in att i will move tmobile . I love it so much! Works fine

Reviews.Title: Super phone. beeter than any other dual core phone including S2.
Reviews.Author: be fair
Reviews.Content: tell you one thing its better than iphone 4 and galxy s2. super phone, super video supporting capability, super speed and perfect camera. the only thing it doesn't have are the reviews because people are trend followers. but try it once it, you will never leave it.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Parks
Reviews.Content: I loved my Prada 2.0, and still have all my iPhones -but this great in your hand. THIN, great speed and cool aesthetic.
